select a.work_number as workNumber, ANY_VALUE(a.emp_name) as empName, sum(a.status=1) as late, sum(a.status=2) as early, sum(a.status=3) as lateAndEarly, sum(a.status=4) as absent, sum(a.status=5) as exp, ANY_VALUE(b.overtime_duration) as overtimeDuration, ANY_VALUE(b.rest_duration) as restDuration, ANY_VALUE(b.leave_duration) as leaveDuration from emp_attendance as a inner join emp as b on a.work_number=b.work_number
and b.work_number = #{workNumber}
and b.dept_number = #{deptNumber}
and year(attendance_date) = date_format(#{year}, '%Y')
and month(attendance_date) = date_format(#{month}, '%m')
group by a.work_number,year(`attendance_date`)
,month(`attendance_date`)
